mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_band_info.select */ SELECT band_id /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */ ,band_mdl_cd /* band_mdl_cd 밴드_모델_코드 character varying(20) */ ,tel_no /* tel_no 전화_번호 character varying(20) */ ,blth_id /* blth_id 블루투스_ID character varying(40) */ ,guar_tel_no_1 /* guar_tel_no_1 보호자_전화_번호_1 character varying(20) */ ,guar_tel_no_2 /* guar_tel_no_2 보호자_전화_번호_2 character varying(20) */ ,api_url_gram_no /* api_url_gram_no API_URL_전문_번호 numeric */ ,api_url_dttm /* api_url_dttm API_URL_일시 character(14) */ ,open_gram_no /* open_gram_no 개통_전문_번호 numeric */ ,band_open_stat_cd /* band_open_stat_cd 밴드_개통_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_band_info WHERE 1 = 1 AND band_id = #{bandId} /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_band_info.insert */ INSERT INTO ts_band_info ( band_id /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */
,band_mdl_cd /* band_mdl_cd 밴드_모델_코드 character varying(20) */
,tel_no /* tel_no 전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,blth_id /* blth_id 블루투스_ID character varying(40) */
,guar_tel_no_1 /* guar_tel_no_1 보호자_전화_번호_1 character varying(20) */
,guar_tel_no_2 /* guar_tel_no_2 보호자_전화_번호_2 character varying(20) */
,api_url_gram_no /* api_url_gram_no API_URL_전문_번호 numeric */
,api_url_dttm /* api_url_dttm API_URL_일시 character(14) */
,open_gram_no /* open_gram_no 개통_전문_번호 numeric */
,band_open_stat_cd /* band_open_stat_cd 밴드_개통_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{bandId} /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */
,#{bandMdlCd} /* band_mdl_cd 밴드_모델_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{telNo} /* tel_no 전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,#{blthId} /* blth_id 블루투스_ID character varying(40) */
,#{guarTelNo1} /* guar_tel_no_1 보호자_전화_번호_1 character varying(20) */
,#{guarTelNo2} /* guar_tel_no_2 보호자_전화_번호_2 character varying(20) */
,#{apiUrlGramNo} /* api_url_gram_no API_URL_전문_번호 numeric */
,#{apiUrlDttm} /* api_url_dttm API_URL_일시 character(14) */
,#{openGramNo} /* open_gram_no 개통_전문_번호 numeric */
,#{bandOpenStatCd} /* band_open_stat_cd 밴드_개통_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_band_info.update */ UPDATE ts_band_info
,band_mdl_cd = #{bandMdlCd} /* band_mdl_cd 밴드_모델_코드 character varying(20) */
,tel_no = #{telNo} /* tel_no 전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,blth_id = #{blthId} /* blth_id 블루투스_ID character varying(40) */
,guar_tel_no_1 = #{guarTelNo1} /* guar_tel_no_1 보호자_전화_번호_1 character varying(20) */
,guar_tel_no_2 = #{guarTelNo2} /* guar_tel_no_2 보호자_전화_번호_2 character varying(20) */
,api_url_gram_no = #{apiUrlGramNo} /* api_url_gram_no API_URL_전문_번호 numeric */
,api_url_dttm = #{apiUrlDttm} /* api_url_dttm API_URL_일시 character(14) */
,open_gram_no = #{openGramNo} /* open_gram_no 개통_전문_번호 numeric */
,band_open_stat_cd = #{bandOpenStatCd} /* band_open_stat_cd 밴드_개통_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND band_id = #{bandId} /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */

,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{bandId} /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */
,#{bandMdlCd} /* band_mdl_cd 밴드_모델_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{telNo} /* tel_no 전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,#{blthId} /* blth_id 블루투스_ID character varying(40) */

,#{openGramNo} /* open_gram_no 개통_전문_번호 numeric */
,#{bandOpenStatCd} /* band_open_stat_cd 밴드_개통_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
,band_mdl_cd = #{bandMdlCd} /* band_mdl_cd 밴드_모델_코드 character varying(20) */
,tel_no = #{telNo} /* tel_no 전화_번호 character varying(20) */

,api_url_dttm = #{apiUrlDttm} /* api_url_dttm API_URL_일시 character(14) */
,open_gram_no = #{openGramNo} /* open_gram_no 개통_전문_번호 numeric */

,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
